Key Match Events: Andrej Kramaric headed in a 70th-minute winner as Croatia fought back from a goal down to claim a 2-1 victory over visitors Scotland
Miscellaneous Highlights: VAR rules out late Scotland equaliser in Croatia
Croatia fought back from a goal down to claim a 2-1 victory over visitors Scotland
Others: The match was played at the Maksimir Stadium in Zagreb, Croatia, with an attendance of 21,702
